Off to Oxford

11 Jul 2013

Well, today's the day for me to whisk off from my lovely home city of Cincinnati, Ohio to the shiny new city of Oxford, England. Tomorrow, I officially start as a full-time intern for the organization Giving What We Can for the next six weeks. I can't say I'm excited to go there, but I certainly am excited to eventually be there. (The going, i.e. the transatlantic flight, doesn't interest me very much.) See you across the pond soon. And if any people there want to meet up, let me know!
